request: Implement comprehensive fix for class access issue - teacher1 has TeacherClassAssignment records but Class Management shows none. Need full system analysis, preserve all relationships, add debugging, ensure no disruption to other features.

consolidated_recommendations.recommendation: Setup: Create test database backup, Set up test fixtures, Clear test cache
Unit Testing: Test individual functions, Test class methods, Verify return values, Check error handling
Integration Testing: Test module interactions, Verify data flow, Check API contracts, Test database operations
Validation: Run full test suite, Generate coverage report, Check for regressions, Document results

action_items.command: git add -A && git commit -m 'CHECKPOINT: Before agent-recommended changes'
coverage run --source='.' manage.py test && coverage report
